entities.name: snakeskin
entities.description: A number of tarnished silver boxes inscribed with languages and an ornate crystal bottle with a large opal set into the stopper are placed on a table. The snakeskin is mentioned as one of the items.

entities.name: tarnished silver boxes
entities.description: A number of tarnished silver boxes inscribed with languages are placed on a table.

entities.name: ornate crystal bottle
entities.description: An ornate crystal bottle with a large opal set into the stopper is placed on a table. The bottle contains what Harry was quite sure was blood.

entities.name: blood
entities.description: The contents of the ornate crystal bottle are described as 'what Harry was quite sure was blood'.

entities.name: Mundungus
entities.description: Hermione mentions Mundungus and his arrival at the doorstep.

entities.name: cauldrons
entities.description: A stack of precariously balanced cauldrons are seen on the doorstep.

relationships.description: Hermione mentions that Mundungus has brought a stack of precariously balanced cauldrons to the doorstep.
Harry observes the contents of the ornate crystal bottle and is quite sure it is blood.
